name: Daniel Massey
goal: The primary goal is to ensure that critical systems have sufficient cybersecurity and robust communications. This is accomplished by promoting open standards on both cybersecurity and network communication. Critical systems include traditional Internet communications and emerging uses such as vehicle communication, medical device communication, smart communities, and the Internet of Things. The primary goal is to ensure that these critical systems have appropriate cybersecurity built into the system.
interests: Communication, Education, Energy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
High Level Expert Group on the Competitiveness and Sustainable Growth of the Automotive Industry in the European Union (GEAR 2030).

This work is directly related to DG GROW, DG Move, and DG Connect.
